entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to rain showers and wet flurries and ending near noon then clearing. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 07 March 2023
